alert.note: Alert for Johnson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Johnson, northwestern Cass and southwestern Jackson Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Overland Park, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Lenexa, Leawood, Grandview, Belton, Stanley, Lackmans and Stillwell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 213 and 224. Interstate 435 between mile markers 0 and 1, and between mile markers 78 and 83. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
